roleset.name: swear, use foul language
roleset.note: CUSS-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
CUSSING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: cuss-v
example.text: Mom says baby doll cussed at her

example.name: cussing-n
example.text: I made a break for shore and could tell by the closeness of his cussing that he was right behind me.
